```{r}
fangraphs <- read.csv("fangraphs_leaderboard_2015-2019.csv")

summarise(fangraphs)

fangraphs <- fangraphs %>%
  mutate(top_homer_hitters = ifelse(HR > median(HR), TRUE, FALSE))

ggplot(fangraphs, aes(x = BB., group = top_homer)) +
  geom_density() +
  facet_wrap(~top_homer_hitters)
test
```
